name: Midnight Drive (Zortog)
description:
A small racing drifting game I made. I hope you enjoy! Feel free to leave feed back and post your highscore screenshots in comments :)

Master the track and controls, keep increasing your speed. Unlock more speed and turbo.  

Controls:

  • AWSD - Move
  • SPACE - Drift
  • P - Pause
  • LShift - Turbo when unlocked

I recommed playing on firefox of all browsers to avoid camera jitter when using turbo.
